title: High levels of Ig promote LR economic growth

content.prompt: Which of the following will most likely contribute to long-run economic growth?

choices.label: High levels of investment in plant and equipment
Low levels of immigration to the country
Low levels of foreign investment in the country

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
